ar-sa.Title: انتهاء الدعم
ar-sa.Content: تطبيق مايكروسوفت 365 غير مدعوم على ويندوز 8. [لمزيد من المعلومات](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/deployoffice/endofsupport/windows-7-support) او [اقرأ الوثيقة ذات الصلة](https://help.coolhub.top/deploy/faq.html#install-office-on-windows-7-or-windows-8).

es-es.Title: Finalización del soporte
es-es.Content: Las aplicaciones de Microsoft 365 ya no son compatibles con Windows 8. [Más información en](https://docs.microsoft.com/es-es/deployoffice/endofsupport/windows-8-support) o [leer documento relacionado en ](https://help.coolhub.top/deploy/faq.html#install-office-on-windows-7-or-windows-8).

en-us.Title: End of support
en-us.Content: Microsoft 365 Apps is no longer supported on Windows 8. [Get more information](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/deployoffice/endofsupport/windows-8-support) or [read related document](https://help.coolhub.top/deploy/faq.html#install-office-on-windows-7-or-windows-8).

fr-fr.Title: Fin du support
fr-fr.Content: Microsoft 365 Apps n’est plus pris en charge sur Windows 8. [Obtenir plus d’informations](https://docs.microsoft.com/fr-fr/deployoffice/endofsupport/windows-8-support) ou [lire le document connexe (Ang.)](https://help.coolhub.top/deploy/faq.html#install-office-on-windows-7-or-windows-8).

pl-pl.Title: Koniec wsparcia
pl-pl.Content: Aplikacje Microsoft 365 nie są już obsługiwane w systemie Windows 8. [Uzyskaj więcej informacji](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/deployoffice/endofsupport/windows-8-support) lub [przeczytaj powiązany dokument](https://help.coolhub.top/deploy/faq.html#install-office-on-windows-7-or-windows-8).

zh-cn.Title: 支持结束
zh-cn.Content: Microsoft 365 应用已经不再支持 Windows 8. [获取更多信息](https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/deployoffice/endofsupport/windows-8-support) 或者 [访问相关文档](https://help.coolhub.top/zh-cn/deploy/faq.html#在-windows-7-或-windows-8-中安装-office)

zh-tw.Title: 支援週期已結束
zh-tw.Content: Microsoft 365 應用程式已停止支援 Windows 8 系統。[瞭解更多資訊](https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-tw/deployoffice/endofsupport/windows-8-support) 或是 [瀏覽相關說明](https://help.coolhub.top/zh-tw/deploy/faq.html#在-windows-7-或-windows-8-中安裝-office)。
